name: Pireto
description:
Take a stroll to the city, listen to the music, collect the pizza and avoid the rat invasion! Do it now mortal!

Keyboard Controls:
Arrow Keys: Movement
Shift: Start
Control: Select
Num 0: Action / Jump

For the Retrograde GameJam, the intention was to emulate the limitations of the NES as much as possible. The real plot is: you are going to a job interview, and the world tries to stop you. Its meant to be "One of those days" for the guy.

If you find some problem, let me know!

pd: I gave this gamepad support, but I couldnt test it because I dont have one. So if you do have one....
